executiveSummary: Demitri Love presented Bundle, a mobile app that allows users to invest spare change into cryptocurrency, seeking $100,000 for 10% equity. After explaining the app, its features, and market strategy, he accepted an offer from a Shark for $100,000 in exchange for 50% equity, securing a major investor for his early-stage business.
keyDecisions: Demitri accepted a $100,000 investment offer from a Shark for 50% equity in Bundle.

actionItems.task: Continue development of the Android app
Implement marketing strategies including viral, blog, and influencer approaches
Track customer acquisition metrics to optimize costs

nextSteps: Demitri will work with the Shark partner to scale Bundle, finalize the Android app, execute marketing strategies, and grow the user base.
